comment.author: 10799299@N00
comment._content: This is Henry Van Dyke, clergyman, author and professor. He was also US Minister to the Netherlands during WWI so this probably on one of his trips to or from the Netherlands. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_van_Dyke

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Perhaps best remembered as a poet.
His wife also looks very Dutch.

comment.author: 29704401@N07
comment._content: Presbyterian Clergyman, native of Germantown, Pennsylvania. Author of the beloved hymn "Joyful, Joyful, We Adore Thee". Read more here: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Van_Dyke
